languages.text: Редкие и бесценные кристаллы, рождающиеся в пылающей магме под огромным давлением. Их энергетический потенциал грандиозен и полностью оправдывает дороговизну добычи, выражаемую в жизнях убитых радиоактивным излучением шахтеров.

Rare and priceless crystals born within flaming magma under immense pressure. Their energy potential is tremendous and fully justifies the cost of harvesting them, measured in the lives of miners killed by irradiation.
languages.original_text: Редкие и бесценные кристаллы, рождающиеся в пылающей магме под огромным давлением. Их энергетический потенциал грандиозен и полностью оправдывает дороговизну добычи, выражаемую в жизнях убитых радиоактивным излучением шахтеров.

traits.locale_text: Rare and priceless minerals born within flaming magma under immense pressure. Their energy potential is tremendous and fully justifies the price of their harvesting measured in the lives of miners killed by irradiation.

Rare and priceless crystals born within flaming magma under immense pressure. Their energy potential is tremendous and fully justifies the cost of harvesting them, measured in the lives of miners killed by irradiation.

languages.text: Cristales raros y preciosos nacidos en el magma ardiente bajo presión inmensa. Su potencial energético es tremendo y justifica plenamente el coste de extraerlos, que se paga con las vidas de los mineros que mueren irradiados.
languages.original_text: Rare and priceless crystals born within flaming magma under immense pressure. Their energy potential is tremendous and fully justifies the cost of harvesting them, measured in the lives of miners killed by irradiation.

traits.locale_text: Cristales raros y preciosos nacidos en el magma ardiente bajo presión inmensa. Su potencial energético es tremendo y justifica plenamente el coste de extraerlos, que se paga con las vidas de los mineros que mueren irradiados.

languages.text: De rares et précieux cristaux façonnés par les pressions incommensurables qui règnent au cœur du magma incandescent. Leur potentiel énergétique immense justifie pleinement leur coût élevé, qui se mesure au nombre des mineurs succombant aux radiations en les récoltant.
languages.original_text: Rare and priceless crystals born within flaming magma under immense pressure. Their energy potential is tremendous and fully justifies the cost of harvesting them, measured in the lives of miners killed by irradiation.

traits.locale_text: De rares et précieux cristaux façonnés par les pressions incommensurables qui règnent au cœur du magma incandescent. Leur potentiel énergétique immense justifie pleinement leur coût élevé, qui se mesure au nombre des mineurs succombant aux radiations en les récoltant.

languages.text: 从炙热高压的岩浆中诞生的珍稀晶体。相比其中蕴含的巨大能量潜力，它的开采成本，即在开采过程中因辐射殒命的矿工性命，可以说是不值一提。
languages.original_text: Rare and priceless crystals born within flaming magma under immense pressure. Their energy potential is tremendous and fully justifies the cost of harvesting them, measured in the lives of miners killed by irradiation.

traits.locale_text: 从炙热高压的岩浆中诞生的珍稀晶体。相比其中蕴含的巨大能量潜力，它的开采成本，即在开采过程中因辐射殒命的矿工性命，可以说是不值一提。

languages.text: 強大な圧力下、燃え盛るマグマの中で生まれた希少で貴重な結晶。そのエネルギーポテンシャルは甚大なものであり、採掘にかかるコストは、照射によって死亡する採掘者の命に換算しても十分にもとがとれる。
languages.original_text: Rare and priceless crystals born within flaming magma under immense pressure. Their energy potential is tremendous and fully justifies the cost of harvesting them, measured in the lives of miners killed by irradiation.

traits.locale_text: 強大な圧力下、燃え盛るマグマの中で生まれた希少で貴重な結晶。そのエネルギーポテンシャルは甚大なものであり、採掘にかかるコストは、照射によって死亡する採掘者の命に換算しても十分にもとがとれる。

languages.text: Seltene und wertvolle Kristalle, die unter gewaltigem Druck in flammendem Magma entstehen. Ihr Energiepotenzial ist gewaltig und rechtfertigt die Abbaukosten, gemessen in den Leben der Bergarbeiter, die durch die Strahlung sterben.
languages.original_text: Rare and priceless crystals born within flaming magma under immense pressure. Their energy potential is tremendous and fully justifies the cost of harvesting them, measured in the lives of miners killed by irradiation.

traits.locale_text: Seltene und wertvolle Kristalle, die unter gewaltigem Druck in flammendem Magma entstehen. Ihr Energiepotenzial ist gewaltig und rechtfertigt die Abbaukosten, gemessen in den Leben der Bergarbeiter, die durch die Strahlung sterben.

languages.text: Yanan magmanın içinde, aşırı yüksek basınç altında doğan nadir ve paha biçilmez kristaller. Enerji potensiyelleri, muazzamdır ve onları çıkarmanın radyoaktif radyasyonla can veren madencilerin hayatlarıyla ölçülen maliyetini haklı gösterir.
languages.original_text: Rare and priceless crystals born within flaming magma under immense pressure. Their energy potential is tremendous and fully justifies the cost of harvesting them, measured in the lives of miners killed by irradiation.
